wikipedia_page.main: Raymond Edward Smallman  (4 August 1929 – 25 February 2015) was a British metallurgist and academic known for his research into alloys and the causes of metal fatigue. Smallman was also a significant figure at the University of Birmingham, serving as its vice-principal between 1987 and 1992 and helping to establish its reputation as a leading modern research university.

response: * August 4 – Raymond Smallman (died 2015), British metallurgist and academic.
*25 February – Raymond Smallman, British metallurgist and academic (b. 1929).
